ygData.subject: Perhaps you can help me troubleshoot
ygData.msgSnippet: Here s my problem. All these people at work told me I just _had_ to get EQ..that I would love it. So I go out and buy the game almost wetting myself in
ygData.messageBody:
Here's my problem. All these people at work told
me I just _had_ to get EQ..that I would love it. So
I go out and buy the game almost wetting myself in
anticipation of playing. I read all the literature and do the
tutorial and sign up on Sony Station and then...I try to
connect. Guess what!? I can't!! I am about to die. So
maybe you kind folk can help me out. Here's the message
I get:<br><br>EverQuest file update failed. If the
problem persists, contact your network administrator or
internet service provider for
assistance.<br>(patch.everquest.com:7000TCP) <br>* ERROR *: Access is denied.<br><br>I am
running DSL. I have also gotten some other host addresses
from SS to try all of which have failed. Do you got
any help for an overzealous newbie?
